entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Lynn Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:19 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
